Html:
WPF toolkit provides sample 7 themes for use with the controls that it ships. At various places on the web, I have found references to the same 7 themes for common Wpf controls (Buttons etc.). However, even after googling out, I could not get my hands on to the source for any of these themes for regular Wpf controls.

So, are these themes open-source? If yes, where can I download them??
